comments.html:
What's wrong with doing all in a one line command?
e.g. ping 10.10.10.10 source 20.20.20.20 repeat 5 size 100 timeout 2 data ABCD
Anyway, nice applet, the question is can you make it partially interactive? such as predefining everything else except the ping destination and the repeat count, for example?
I mean, the user only types ping, then it prompts for IP and amount, all the rest is implicit...
comments.name: zivley

comments.html: I also couldn't figure that out ... well I was not trying hard ;) Will do a post on an interactive version, it's quite doable with EEM 3.0.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: Hi - TOS is missing - that's a point (maybe available in 15?!) . Maybe he's using clns ping.. also a point :-)
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html:
because there are some versions not supporting the extended ping in one line command.
thanks IVAN for you HELP.
comments.name: mhouba

comments.html: That must be a switch, right? Can't image a router having decent EEM (with "pattern" keyword) and not having one-line ping.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
